column4: I recently did 'apt-get upgrade' and now Firefox won't display images (just a blank space where they should be). Any tips?
I removed libgd2-noxpm and replaced it with libgd2-xpm -- could that be related? I tried going back, but it doesn't seem to make a difference.
MrKlown; Fixed. Thx. (Not my computer, user must have changed settings.)
no images makes for a faster browsing experience :)
